snippet: Zhang Yimou, the prominent Chinese film director, acknowledged that he had two sons and a daughter with his current wife but denied rumors that he had seven children with four different women.
abstract: Zhang Yimou, the prominent Chinese film director, acknowledged that he had two sons and a daughter with his current wife but denied rumors that he had seven children with four different women.

headline.main: Zhang Yimou Offers to Pay Fine for One-Child Policy Violation
headline.print_headline: Film Director Runs Afoul Of China’s One-Child Law
